definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: He stood up to reply for the guests.
sentences.chinese: 他站起來代表來賓致答詞。

sentences.english: Roosevelt and Hull both replied in words that scarcely concealed their disgust.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福和赫爾的答詞，幾乎沒有隱藏他們的憎惡之情。

sentences.english: He responded to our speech of welcome.
sentences.chinese: 他對我們的歡迎詞做了答詞。
